con:testCase.name: GoodCase-DEV-CreditCard-AccessRights
con:testCase.con:description:
Tests destrictions from us: https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-993 https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-899 SR57212 U-036 DRC ASRI.docx
The existing chargeCustomer method should be enhanced for supporting credit card payments. Following constraints for this SR are relevant for charging functionality: Only ON_DEMAND charges are supported Only brand AldiTalk and Ay Yildiz allowed to use credit card, other brand/tenants are not supported (this means no changes to the DD settings in this SR)

con:configuration.con:originalMessage: <soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>Service provider: LO not accepted for channel: creditcard</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:drcFault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>Service provider not accepted for channel</originatorMessage> <errorCode>1050</errorCode> <message>Service provider not accepted for channel</message> </ns2:drcFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>Used PaymentUseCase is not allowed</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:drcFault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>Used PaymentUseCase is not allowed</originatorMessage> <errorCode>105</errorCode> <message>Used PaymentUseCase is not allowed</message> </ns2:drcFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>Used PaymentUseCase is not allowed</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:drcFault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>Used PaymentUseCase is not allowed</originatorMessage> <errorCode>105</errorCode> <message>Used PaymentUseCase is not allowed</message> </ns2:drcFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>

<soap:Envelope xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/"> <soap:Body> <soap:Fault> <faultcode>soap:Server</faultcode> <faultstring>Registration option for packpayment is missing</faultstring> <detail> <ns2:drcFault xmlns:ns2="http://directrecharge.o2.com/ws/evolutionservice/customercharging/"> <retryPossible>false</retryPossible> <originator>DRC</originator> <originatorMessage>Used PaymentUseCase is not allowed</originatorMessage> <errorCode>105</errorCode> <message>Used PaymentUseCase is not allowed</message> </ns2:drcFault> </detail> </soap:Fault> </soap:Body> </soap:Envelope>
